rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol

bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de yang dag par spong

pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ yang dag par spong ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su
mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po lnga la mos shing

'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de dbang po rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ dbang po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe stobs lnga la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de stobs rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/
stobs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de byang chub kyi yan lag la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par
'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi
'grol| sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las
yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/
skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de bsam
gtan rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ bsam gtan mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
dang | sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug ba las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshad med pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshad med pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ tshad med pa mngon par
'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs

med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde dang /
'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa/ gal
te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thar pa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam pa thar pa rnams la mos shing

'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis na/ de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis

rlob pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
dang | yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /

mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa drug la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mngon par shes pa rnams la mos

shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mngon par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la
spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug
bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin

gyis rlob na/ de lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre
sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/

shes rab kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi mig la

mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ chos kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
ba dang | mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /
gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing
'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
rlob pas/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
ba dang | 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzungs kyi sgo mngon par 'du bya ba
la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/
sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos
shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye

ba dang | rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs
su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mi 'jigs

pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mi 'jigs pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/
so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
ba dang | yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/
de ni| skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal
chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'ang / rang sangs

rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs la mi spyod de/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs
mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/
gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar

mi spyod| gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba la mi spyod de/ tshor ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshor ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba
bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba ma

zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor
ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du shes la mi spyod de/ 'du shes
kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'du shes rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du
shes bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du
shes mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes smon pa med

ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du byed la mi spyod de/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la spyod cing / 'du byed rtag ces bya bar mi
spyod| 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar mi

spyod| 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/

'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod
pa dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi
spyod| rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med
ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mig la mi spyod de/ mig gi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mig rtag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig bdag med ces bya bar
mi spyod| mig zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig
mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa

dang | rna ba la mi spyod de/ rna ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rna ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya

mi spyod| yid kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/

khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal

dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ srid pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / skye ba la mi spyod de/ skye ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / skye ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba mi rtag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba
zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye
ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ skye ba mi dben zhes
bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rga shi la mi spyod de/ rga shi'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rga shi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mi rtag ces bya
bar mi spyod/ rga shi bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga
shi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
spyod| rga shi mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga
shi mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar
mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod

bar mi spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya
bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu

bar mi spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med

med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yang dag par spong
ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal

dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag

bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi

mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la mi spyod de/ dbang po rnams kyi
mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma med
ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi
dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar
mi spyod| stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi
spyod| stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs
rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi
spyod| stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan
ma la mi spyod cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med
ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan

ma la mi spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi

ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces
bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ tshad med pa rnams
kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa
rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi

tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par thar
pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya

la mi spyod de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi

pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag

nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/

pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces
bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi stong
zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag
med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi
sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes bya
bar mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag
med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
spyod| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi
spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi
'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan
ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar
mi spyod| mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi
spyod| so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag
med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes
bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod

cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying

rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po stong

zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa
yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag
ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med
ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces
bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
pa| bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs
med| gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes ma
yin| stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du shes med/ 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid
gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las
gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang mig med/ mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig /mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid

las gud na'ang rna ba med/ rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang sna med/ sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang lce med/ lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang lus med/ lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang yid med/ yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sgra'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra ma yin/

stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra med/ sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang dri med/ dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang ro med/ ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ro/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
reg med/ reg las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg /reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos
med| chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi khams ma yin/ stong pa
nyid las gud na'ang mig gi khams med/ mig gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams/ mig gi khams nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs kyi khams med/ gzugs kyi khams las
gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams/ gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
med de| stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i
khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams/ rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do| |sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra'i khams med/ sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
nyid kyang sgra'i khams/ sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rna
ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i khams med/ sna'i khams las
gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams/ sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang dri'i khams med/ dri'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams/ dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa
nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang
stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i
khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i khams med/ lce'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams/ lce'i khams
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ro'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro'i khams med/ ro'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med
de| stong pa nyid kyang ro'i khams/ ro'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong
pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/
lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi khams med/ lus
kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams/ lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg gi khams
ma yin| stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg gi khams med/ reg gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams/ reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/
lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
kyang yid kyi khams/ yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi khams med/
chos kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams/ chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang
stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sa'i
khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sa'i khams med/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams/ sa'i khams nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chu'i khams med/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang chu'i khams/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med/
me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams
ma yin| stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med/ rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang
stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes
pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i
khams| rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa las
gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du
nyid med| 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma
yin| stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
med de| stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang skye mched drug med/ skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /reg pa'i
stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med/ reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg pa/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do| |tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/
tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med/ sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang sred pa/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med/ len pa las gud na'ang stong
pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang len pa/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med/ srid
pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang srid pa/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang

skye ba med/ skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye ba/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud

na'ang rga shi med/ rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa med/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa med| bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /nang stong pa

nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nang

stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid mad/ phyi stong pa nyid las

gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid

las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong

pa nyid med/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang don
dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/
stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med/
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med
pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/ thog ma dang tha ma

med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong
pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa

nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma
yin| stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid
med| chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa
nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong
pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med
pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med

pa stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin
pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa
nyid las gud na'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid
kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dbang po rnams med/ dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa
nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dbang po/ /dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang stobs rnams med/ stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa
nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa
nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
med de| stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin
pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang bsam gtan rnams med/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa
nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa/
tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med/ rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med/ mngon par shes pa rnams
las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting
nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ gzungs kyi
sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa
nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i
stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig
pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
so so yang dag par rig pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang byams pa chen po med/ byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ /byams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen

po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje
chen po| |snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong
pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thams cad shes pa nyid/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do/ /zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la/ mi
spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/
spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dngos
po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do
zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang
ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de'ang
chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams
cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba/ mchog tu bya ba/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di
