'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan
la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa
bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin
rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po'ang
gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so// //shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna
ba'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ sna'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'ang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma/
sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgra'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sgra'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dri'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o/ /bcom ldan
'das| ro'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
te| reg nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ lce'i rnam par shes ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das| lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi
rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid
kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan
'das| sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang sa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rlung gi khams
kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ bcom ldan 'das/ reg pa'ang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sred pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ len pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ srid
pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skye ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rga shi'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
rga shi'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa

nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan
'das| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid
kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par
spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid
kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs
rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang
gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
te| tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu
ma| sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ so so
yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ snying
rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan
ma lags te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan
ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang byang chub kyang
gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
lags| sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga bo skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/
rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la
'du shes med cing / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag
med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
bslab cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du
gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis
ba'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po
lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar sgyu ma ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs
su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni/ dngos po ma mchis
pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
sems| mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
ni| mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig yor ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su
ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar chu zla ni/ dngos po ma mchis
pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung
po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar smig rgyu ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar sprul pa ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos
po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs ni/ rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni/ rmi lam
lta bu| 'du shes ni/ rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni/ rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes par gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po drug go /de ni/ phung po lnga'o//

de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen
po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
so| |mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs

pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni/ sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni/ sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni/ sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par

shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po drug go/ de ni/ phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
so| |dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
phyir mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu| tshor ba ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu/
rnam par shes pa ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po drug go/ de ni/ phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni/ mig yor lta bu/
tshor ba ni/ mig yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni/ mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang

po drug go/ de ni/ phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong

pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /

rab 'byor/ gzugs ni/ chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni/ chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni/ chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni/ chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/

dbang po drug go /de ni/ phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs

so| |rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
gzugs ni/ smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni/ smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni/ smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni/ smig

rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po drug go /de ni/ phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang
stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus
byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/
gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor
ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes
so| |'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa
stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |stong pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna'i stong

pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
lce'o| |lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid
kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /

sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa
nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang reg go /chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong
pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong
pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg
pa'o| |lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa'o| |yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te
reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/
stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa
nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong
pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams
kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i
khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes
pa'i khams steng pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa
stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /

skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong

pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
tshor ba'o/ /sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin
gyi| len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang srid

pa'o| |skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga sha'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid

kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa
nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa
nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis

nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong

pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong

pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /
don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ 'dus
byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa
stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang
bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis
chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid do| |mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs

pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin
gyi| yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma
yin gyi| rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams
stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do| |stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do| |stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis
bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams
stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam
par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa'i stong pa
nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes
pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /
gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mi
'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do| |stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong

pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa
nyid do| |stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab
'byor| 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs me dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam
po bzhi bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
ni| gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag

pa'o| |gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi

mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya
bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe bdun pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di
ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs
po'i lag tu lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems sa byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs
te| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

ba med par gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
